description:
A man sleeps and waits for good news.  A woman wants to divorce her husband because his mother farts too much. A man marries a snake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kahou wa Nete Mate / Hekoki Baa / Tonbi no Tamago
Sleep and Wait For Good News / The Farting Old Woman / The Black Kite`s Egg
果報は寝て待て / 屁こき婆 / とんびの卵
